name: Baking Simulator 2022
description:
The game works best in full screen!

Can you pass the simulation?

Can you delay the inevitability that another baker will take your place?

Alone in the kitchen, can you figure out how to PERFECTLY replicate a recipe? You're not given the best instructions, and there seems to be some strangeness afoot, but I'm sure you can do it!

Controls:

Left Click - Pick up Ingredients/Measuring Spoons/Cups 

Right Click - Set something down*

Left Click - Fill cake pan  

Left Click - Interact with Objects

Teamwork!

Just kidding, I worked alone \o/

I made all the art, music and code myself :3 *Update* I added a new background song from Incompetech so it was nicer on the ears :3  So I've opted out of Audio ratings because of that :3 I DEFINITELY scoped this project wayyyyy too big but I STILL GOT A WORKING??? game out of it :3  

Thanks for making it this far and playing my game! You've come far and worked hard, have a cupcake \o/
